mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item_commodity_info as i JOIN item_commodity_category as c on i.category_id=c.category_id where c.category_pid = #{categoryPid}

select commodity_id, brand_id, item_commodity_name, origin_price, color_list, size_list, origin_address, accept_address_list, item_id, price, details, imags_list, inventory, free_shipping_num, category_id, coupons_list, tag_list, degree_loss FROM item_commodity_info where commodity_id = #{commodityId}
select * FROM item_commodity_info c INNER JOIN item_info i ON c.item_id = i.item_id
select * FROM item_collection ic INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON ic.commodity_id = i.commodity_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 AND ic.`status` = 1
SELECT * FROM item_follow_focus f INNER JOIN item_info i ON f.item_id = i.item_id WHERE f.follow_id = #{userId} and f.`status` = 0 and i.`status` = 0

SELECT avatar_imag as commodity_pic , i.item_commodity_name , i. price, h.create_time as accessTime, i.commodity_id FROM item_commodity_history h INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON h.commodity_id=i.commodity_id WHERE h.user_id=1 AND i.`status`=1

SELECT c.commodity_id, i.item_name, i.user_image AS seller_pic, c.`status`, c.avatar_imag AS commodity_pic, c.item_commodity_name, c.price FROM item_info i INNER JOIN user_info u ON i.uid = u.uid INNER JOIN item_commodity_info c ON i.item_id = c.item_id WHERE u.uid = #{userId} AND c.`status` =#{examineStatus}

SELECT c.commodity_id, i.item_name, i.user_image AS seller_pic, c.`status`, c.avatar_imag AS commodity_pic, c.item_commodity_name, c.price FROM item_info i INNER JOIN user_info u ON i.uid = u.uid INNER JOIN item_commodity_info c ON i.item_id = c.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId} AND c.`status` !=0
